Posts.EditableText:
Hello

So, I’ve only played Bureaucracy (Douglas Adams wrote that one, by the way), which was pretty good, and the recent CYPHER, which was pretty bad. Anyway, these two got me interested in the whole text adventure thing, so can you give me some recommendations, please?
Posts.HTML:
Hello

So, I’ve only played Bureaucracy (Douglas Adams wrote that one, by the way), which was pretty good, and the recent CYPHER, which was pretty bad. Anyway, these two got me interested in the whole text adventure thing, so can you give me some recommendations, please?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

My current top three:

The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy (by the same 2 authors who created Bureaucracy, Douglas Adams and Steve Meretzky)
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/3cbedqimquselmanehhzxg/the-hitchhikers-guide-to-the-galaxy

The Bony King of Nowhere (by Necrodeath)
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/z2yqtt1as0qxprpe1f5xag/the-bony-king-of-nowhere

Good Night (by XanMag)
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/otwghen-rugkm8qcg7pita/good-night

A few I love are:
Zeppelin Adventure
The Guttersnipe series
Hitchikers Guide to the Galaxy
Detective Land
Zork
Deeper by The Pixie
Space Invaders
